original_text: I did not send those prophets. But they have still run to speak to you. I did not tell them what to say, but they have continued to prophesy. I did not send those prophets.
korean_text: 이 선지자들은 내가 보내지 아니하였어도 달음질하며 내가 그들에게 이르지 아니하였어도 예언하였은즉

sentences.original_text: I did not send those prophets.
But they have still run to speak to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 여전히 당신에게 말하려고 달려갔다.

sentences.original_text: I did not tell them what to say,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들에게 무엇을 말해야 할지 말하지 않았다,

sentences.original_text: but they have continued to prophesy.
I did not send those prophets.
